testcase.name: To verify the Save button functionality present on the Edit Profile Screen
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-dev.exela.global/#/login"............passed When enter the user name as "sid76@mailinator.com"..........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the Login button..........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed When user click on profile icon.............................................passed Then user should display personal information...............................passed Then user click on edit button..............................................passed Then user enter Fname as "sidd".............................................passed Then user enter Lname as "Ing"..............................................passed Then user click on save button..............................................passed Then user confirmation message get display as "Successfully Updated.".......passed Then user click on edit button..............................................passed Then user enter LName as "".................................................passed Then user click on save button..............................................passed Then user click on mail tab then error get display for mandatory field as "Last name is required".passed Then user click on save button..............................................passed Then user confirmation message get display as "Successfully Updated.".......passed
